title: Mnēmosynon Paulinum Salutare Amorem Nostrum Crucifixum Qui Resurrexit, Cujus ex doloribus æterna gaudia, ex vulneribus paratam medicinam e discessu accessum ad Patrem quotquot volumus, habemus Quatuor juvenes pietate, diligentia, obsequio, conspicui, explanabunt Primus Johann Heinricus Goezius, Halberstadiensis ... Secundus, Joh. Bernhardus Hoefer, Erxlebia-Magdeburg. ... Tertius, Samuel Rudolphi, Schönhaga Marchicus ... Quartum, Paulus Betge, Eichenbarlebio-Magdeb. ... Quintus Christian Otto Crause, Stendal. Palæo-Marchic[us] ... V. Id. Martii, hora octav. matut. adesse velitis ea, qua decet, observantia rogat M. Johann Balth. Elend, Schol. Senat. Rect.
creator: Elend, Johann Balthasar
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Elend, Johann Balthasar: Mnēmosynon Paulinum Salutare Amorem Nostrum Crucifixum Qui Resurrexit, Cujus ex doloribus æterna gaudia, ex vulneribus paratam medicinam e discessu accessum ad Patrem quotquot volumus, habemus Quatuor juvenes pietate, diligentia, obsequio, conspicui, explanabunt Primus Johann Heinricus Goezius, Halberstadiensis ... Secundus, Joh. Bernhardus Hoefer, Erxlebia-Magdeburg. ... Tertius, Samuel Rudolphi, Schönhaga Marchicus ... Quartum, Paulus Betge, Eichenbarlebio-Magdeb. ... Quintus Christian Otto Crause, Stendal. Palæo-Marchic[us] ... V. Id. Martii, hora octav. matut. adesse velitis ea, qua decet, observantia rogat M. Johann Balth. Elend, Schol. Senat. Rect.. Halberstadii  Berlin 1705
